pr_title: [GEOT-6487] CSVDatastore ignores the projection of output geometry

timeline.bodyText: Is this just left over from the old tutorial code? Just want to make sure we aren't breaking a docs reference.
timeline.author: bradh

replies.bodyText: The docs code is now completely broken out and I think I've finally found all of these.
replies.author: ianturton

timeline.bodyText: Suggestion, check that the contents can be read and have the expected value. Maybe by just round tripping, that, is, read back the file with a new store instance and checking that the CRS associated to the feature type is the expected one.
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: Just as well I checked - it was wrong :-(
replies.author: ianturton
